title: Support main looking for a Duo Partner OCE

embed.description: Shamblez / Silver 5 53LP / 113W 137L Win Ratio 45% / Galio - 17W 19L Win Ratio 47%, Lulu - 15W 12L Win Ratio 56%, Nocturne - 8W 10L Win Ratio 44%, Sejuani - 3W 13L Win Ratio 19%, Maokai - 4W 7L Win Ratio 36%

body:
{{item:3504}} Support Main {{item:3107}} 

My name is Kerry (Shamblez) and I am an OCE player reigning from Queensland, Australia. I quit my job to do this full time and along side getting coached by a Master I am studying the game inside and out and looking at ways to get better. My hopes are to in 2018 be able to join a team. I play Monday - Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm AEST (about 9 hours a day) and am looking for someone to Duo with ( or multiple people) in those times.

I am looking to Duo with an ADC but any position is fine. Some requirements are below:
- Must have Discord or Team Speak
- Must have an understanding of the game
- Must have a desire to get better
- Cannot be arrogant or have the bronze mentality

* Full Disclaimer

I love the game and enjoy it. I have fun, BUT, I am not here to muck around and have laughs. If you want laughs and a good time we can play ARAM together. I am here to get better, win and advance. I treat this more like a job than a hobby. I love being able to do this all day and it makes me happy, win or loss, because I am learning and getting better and slowly progressing to my ultimate goal. HOWEVER, I am not here to throw games or go backwards so I only ask that people who want to DUO with me have the same mentality.

A bit about me:

Along side playing League of Legends I am also studying Psychology. I have a cool and calm nature about me. I can be a bit bossy but that's because I love winning and I want to get better and advance through the ranks. My favorite champion is Lulu and my champion pool atm is:
{{champion:117}}  Lulu
{{champion:89}} Leona
{{champion:37}} Sona
{{champion:267}} Nami
{{champion:40}} Janna
{{champion:44}} Taric

I have been climbing solo but I find it a lot easier with a Duo partner but I need someone that wants to climb and knows their champions inside and out like myself and wants to get better and learn. If you tick the boxes and are sick of getting bad ques then add me in game and we will play some normal matches and see what your ability is like and whether we click in Discord/Team Speak.

Thank you for your time and good luck on the Rift! :)

replies.body: I did indeed my friend. Everyone has to start somewhere and this means I can put in more time than others and catch up hard! Also it means when I do go pro I am already familiar to the schedules and lifestyle :)
Dw ill throw money in your tin when you're homeless
Wait you are silver 5 and you quit your job to go pro :/

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tNUBQUy1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-15T01:26:40.577+0000)
>
> Wait you are silver 5 and you quit your job to go pro :/

OMG LLAMA HI PLEASE RESPOND I WANT TO TALK TO YOU

Bump. Still looking. Found some people and been climbing but want some more available partners. Solo Que is Cancer and basically putting faith into the gods.

Add me in game. If you are an ADC main you HAVE to at the very minimum be able to get 8cs/min and have lane mechanics understanding. Thank you.

To go pro you have to be minimum diamond but they won't look at you if you aren't capable of challenger. I don't know what your life situation is but throwing away your livelihood on a gamble that you will some how miraculously improve faster than basically everyone else on the server is more insane than that meme White Pumah trying to get tryouts on challenger teams despite being 2000 games gold 5. If I was negative win rate in SILVER I would probably not be quitting my job to pursue a professional league of legends career.

Thank you for the concern. Lucky you're not giving everything up to pursue this and I am :) I wouldn't do this if I wasn't well off and hadn't the money to do it. Don't worry about my financials. All you need to know is, keep an eye out for Shamblez in 2018 :D

Also I play 9 hours a day, 45 hours a week. I am getting coached and I have good game sense. Outside of playing League I study lane mechanics, warding proper, how to engage, disengage, item choices, etc. I didn't know everyone else on the server was doing this exact thing? 

Thank you for the concern but I will be fine :)
Add me in-game. If we work hard together and think we could be the next Pray and Gorilla
